ssnapstats 0.0.1
  • Reference

dnpctlist

Source: R/apply_measure_functions.R
dnpctlist.Rd

dnpct generates a set of aggregation measures for a list of measures: namely the (D)enominator for all measures, and the (N)umerator and (P)er(C)en(T)age for each item in the list.

dnpctlist(output_measure, fun_d, funs_list_n)

Arguments

output_measure

The stem name for the output values.
fun_d

The function to provide the denominator. This should be a vector of logicals.
funs_list_n

A named list of functions to provide the numerator. Each function should evaluate to a vector of logicals, and should be uniquely named.

Details

Many cohort aggregation functions, particularly in the portfolio cohorts, need to calculate a denominator, a numerator, and a percentage for a group of related items, such as converting a numeric value into a series of banded results. This function simplifies the code, making it easier to read.

The outputs are consistently named: a stem name is used, with D suffixed for the denominator. The list items should be named, and the list item name followed by N and Pct are appended as suffixes for each item in the list.

Contents
